sql.name: 记录登录信息
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_session_log (id, session_id, user_name, login_date, client_ip, remark) VALUES (':id', ':sessionId', ':userName', ':loginDate', ':clientIp', ':remark')

sql.name: 记录管理员操作日志
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_admin_log (id, user_name, operation_date, operation_module, operation_desc) VALUES (':id', ':userName', ':operationDate', ':operationModule', ':operationDesc')

sql.name: 记录信息修改
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_operation_log (id, user_name, operation_date, operation_type, operation_desc,old_value, new_value, project_id, operation_part, update_field ) VALUES (':id', ':userName', ':operationDate', ':operationType',':operationDesc', ':oldValue', ':newValue', ':projectId', ':operationPart', ':updateField')

sql.name: 获取信息修改日志
sql.content: SELECT id, operation_date, operation_desc,old_value, new_value, project_id, operation_part, ( SELECT full_name from t_user u where u.id = log.user_name) as user_name, case when operation_type='box' then '机箱' when operation_type='processor' then '处理器' when operation_type='detector' then '探测器' else operation_type end as operation_type , update_field FROM t_operation_log log
